body:
I am a newbie to selenium webdriver. I am currently testing Search functionality in my project. I have written some code that navigates to the page, enters some data (that is retrieved from excel sheet) in the search field and submits the query.

Now, because there is a sample data of 1000 items that the search functionality has to run through.. how can I perform verification if the returned result (filtered results) is correct?

Do I have to write my own search function or do I keep a store of expected results on another excel sheet and compare with the search query result?.. 

Please help.
Thank you.
title: Newbie to selenium- Testing search functionality
